text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, any royalties or fees paid to any county board or to the Department as a result of assistance provided under this subtitle shall be used by the county board or Department for further development of curriculum-based learning resources authorized under this subtitle.

section.section: The State Superintendent shall allow an eligible consortium to receive a financial benefit from the distribution of programming assisted under this subtitle.

An eligible consortium that receives a financial benefit shall use the benefit:
To support further development of curriculum-specific programming; and
To provide greater access to a wider audience of educational programming.
